snippet: His policies improved conditions for poor Venezuelans, but he left a stained legacy, and his main theme seemed to be taunting the United States.
abstract: Editorial assesses Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez's legacy, in light of his death; contends that United States should make clear its support for democratic and civilian transition in post-Chavez Venezuela.
lead_paragraph: His policies improved conditions for poor Venezuelans, but he left a stained legacy, and his main theme seemed to be taunting the United States.
